title: ClawMenu 3.0.0 – Create custom menus for your apps (was PiquantMenu)
content: ClawMenu finds its place between the Finder and LauchPad, offering a whole new access to your files. title: Pochade 2.1.4 – Full-spectrum colors picker
content: Pochade easily allows you to select any color from your screen, save your collection of colors, and get the color value the way you want. Pochade is ideal for anyone that often has to get different color values from their screen. You can also import your existing collections. We support ACO, ASE, and CLR files […]

title: Tuba 1.4 – Super fast and elegantly designed YouTube app
content: Tuba is a super fast and elegantly designed YouTube app for your beloved Mac   Why use Tuba app instead of youtube.com? 1) The app is blazing fast compare with the website.Everything is much faster. 2) Better design: more content, no clutter. 3) Save 50% battery. title: dupeGuru Music Edition 6.5.1 – Find duplicate songs in your music collection
content: dupeGuru Music Edition is a tool to find duplicate songs in your music collection. It can scan filenames, tags, or contents. dupeGuru ME is efficient. Find your duplicate files in minutes, thanks to its quick fuzzy-matching algorithm. dupeGuru ME not only finds filenames and tags that are the same, but it also finds similar ones. […]

title: dupeGuru Picture Edition 2.7.1 – Find duplicate pictures on your computer
content: dupeGuru Picture Edition (PE for short) is a tool to find duplicate pictures on your computer. dupeGuru PE is a big brother of dupeGuru. It works like dupeGuru, but is specialized for duplicate pictures matching. dupeGuru PE is efficient. Find your duplicate pictures in minutes, thanks to its quick fuzzy matching algorithm. title: EasyVPN 1.5.4 – Interface for VPN server
content: EasyVPN is an interface for the standards-based VPN Server that is included in Mac OS X. Apple provides an interface for OS X Server but not for regular OS X. EasyVPN provides a similar, yet simple interface to fully configure the VPN Server. WHAT’S NEWVersion 1.5.4: Improved start on system launch Updated license engine UI […]

title: FileChute 4.5.6 – Quick Internet file transfer tool
content: FileChute offers an easier way to send large files. How many times have you tried to email a large file only to have it bounce? FileChute makes sending files easy. Just drag a file and drop it on FileChute. FileChute puts the file on your Dropbox or website and generates a Web link for retrieving the […]

title: moneyGuru 2.7.0 – Personal finance management application
content: moneyGuru is a personal finance management application. With it, you can evaluate your financial situation so you can make informed (and thus better) decisions.
